Pre-Game Insights: Australia will be taking on Pakistan in the 18th game of the ICC Cricket World Cup, 2023 at the M. Chinnaswamy Stadium, Bengaluru on 20th October 2023 at 02:00 PM IST.
Australia have played 3 matches in the series and are currently ranked seventh on the points table, while Pakistan have also played 3 matches and are currently ranked fourth.

The pitch at the M. Chinnaswamy Stadium, Bengaluru is a balanced pitch with an average 1st innings score of 242 runs in the last 20 matches. Chasing a target should be preferred as the team batting first has only won 35% of its matches.
The temperature will hover around 29°C with humidity expected to be around 38%. Winds at a speed of 3.83 m/s are expected.
The venue is suited for both pacers and spinners alike.
In the 107 matches played between Australia and Pakistan, the batters of both teams have earned the most fantasy points for their respective teams so far.
